description:
Have you always wanted to learn how to use Salesforce's Analytics Cloud, built on its Wave technology? Or maybe you've always wanted to use a Business Intelligence (BI) Tool to gain insights into data but found it too inaccessible? Or it could be that you just want to learn about exciting developments in technology on a new platform?


If any of these are yes, then this is the course for you!!


Learn how to use Salesforce Analytics Cloud in 30 minutes!! I will take you through the steps required to set this up and show you how to use it. We will go through the basics involved and deep dive into data and gain insight from it, using beautiful visualizations to show this on both a browser as well as a mobile device! Within 30 minutes, you will have all you need to impress your colleagues and bosses, show how to add value to data, and have your own Developer environment to continue playing around with and learning more!
title: Salesforce Analytics Cloud: Learn how to use Wave in 30mins!
